author: mike.ferris
content: CDAP Portal Sync (at 11:30 am EST from now on): https://zoom.us/j/92366142962?pwd=WHdNbzc1R3RnYkpENjEvKytyZUFUZz09

author: pipermerriam
content:
Huzzah! merged first draft of history network specification.  That gives us draft specs for state and history, and a preliminary spec in place for header accumulator.  No urgency, but that leaves us needing draft specs for:

- tx gossip network (this probably needs to be written by me/piper)
- header gossip network (which includes the accumulator)
- canonical indices networks (maybe two independent specs to keep tx and blk-number separate)
